name: Mobilized force
description:
Real time strategy tower defence game!
Protect your base and defeat the enemies.

Organize the callouts to each base, send tanks and planes to take out the enemies before they take you out.
3 different game modes to play,

* Story mode
* Ground war
* AI vs AI
* Air battles

Tell your forces to strike, mobilize and bring this mobile war to an end!
Mobilize your forces right away and bring out the final orders to victory, are you ready to take out the enemies?

NO ADS
NO IN APP PURCHASES

100% gaming with no disturbance
